scripts.postbuild: cpy manifest.json icon.png dist/ && cpy src/*.html dist/ && cpy src/styles/**/* dist/styles/ && cpy src/assets/**/* dist/assets/
scripts.dev:init: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist && cpy manifest.json icon.png src/*.html dist/ && cpy src/styles/**/* dist/styles/ && cpy src/assets/**/* dist/assets/
scripts.dev: npm run dev:init && concurrently "tsc --watch" "chokidar 'src/styles/**/*.css' -c 'cpy src/styles/**/* dist/styles/'" "chokidar 'src/*.html' -c 'cpy src/*.html dist/'" "chokidar 'cpy src/assets/**/* dist/assets/'"
